title: dll error
body: I just went back from win 10 to 8.1 and i start getting this error https://snag.gy/DK5Ghl.jpg , does anyone know how to fix it ?

replies.body: It looks like your game files may have corrupted.  I suggest going over our[ reinstall guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to get things back to norma..  You can also use our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to automatically run a clean reinstall for the game.  This should get you fixed up!
